short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that alerts you whenever you are reading content written by AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you tired of being misled by AI-generated content? With the rapid advancement of AI language models, it can be difficult to discern between what's written by a human and what's written by a machine. That's where GPT-Aware comes in - a powerful Chrome extension that lets you know just how much of an article was written by an AI language model. With GPT-Aware, you can be sure that you're reading reliable and trustworthy content, free from the biases and inaccuracies that can come with AI-generated text. Don't be fooled by AI-written content - install GPT-Aware today and stay informed!
